content.raw:
I am able to reproduce it sometimes now. It seems to be a quaternion thing, and quaternions are not very intuitive for me so I have to think a bit more about it. I removed that part of the PR and will revisit it later if that's ok. ecf34c2

Basically, when that happens, if I check the RPY components of `rot` right before calling `_vis->SetWorldRotation(rot);`, I get that the quaternion is representing the correct rotation of -45 degrees, but the cylinder doesn't move. Then when the angle is -90 it does rotate. So just looking at RPY, it should be working...
